:contextual-insert-note.label: t__Add note
:contextual-insert-note.description: t__Contains text that is related to the main text.

:insert-note--task.label: t__Note
:insert-note--task.description: t__Contains information that expands on or calls attention to a particular point. This information is typically differentiated from the main text.

:insert-note[@type=attention]--task.label: t__Attention note
:insert-note[@type=attention]--task.description: t__Please pay extra attention to this note.

:insert-note[@type=danger]--task.label: t__Danger note
:insert-note[@type=danger]--task.description: t__Important! Be aware of this before doing anything else.

:insert-note[@type=fastpath]--task.label: t__Fastpath note
:insert-note[@type=fastpath]--task.description: t__This note will speed you on your way.

:insert-note[@type=notice]--task.label: t__Notice note
:insert-note[@type=notice]--task.description: t__Indicates a potential situation which, if not avoided, might result in an undesirable result or state.

:insert-note[@type=other]--task.label: t__Other note
:insert-note[@type=other]--task.description: t__This is something other than a normal note.

:insert-note[@type=remember]--task.label: t__Remember note
:insert-note[@type=remember]--task.description: t__Don't forget to do what this note says.

:insert-note[@type=restriction]--task.label: t__Restriction note
:insert-note[@type=restriction]--task.description: t__You can't do what this note says.

:insert-note[@type=tip]--task.label: t__Tip note
:insert-note[@type=tip]--task.description: t__This is a fine little tip.
